data.title: Celebrity Families: Latest News and Updates
data.text:
Vince Vaughn had two things to celebrate on August 12 at the premiere of his new Apple TV+ series and Hollywood Walk of Fame ceremony – and wife of 14 years Kyla Weber was right by his side

Zach Bryan is fiercely protective of his parents and their legacy – and the 28-year-old country singer just hit back against their critics before deleting his Instagram account

The 15-year-old middle child of the Don’t Speak singer and frontman of British rock band Bush recently made his country music debut at his stepfather Blake Shelton’s bar in Oklahoma

Jessica Chastain may be an Academy Award-winning actress, but did you know her husband Gian Luca Passi de Preposulo is an Italian count? Here’s what we know about him …

The designer had an idyllic childhood with her sister and was an attendant at last year’s coronation; she worked on King Charles’ Duchy of Cornwall before being removed from the payroll by Prince William

She’s opened for Shania Twain, Haim and her brother’s ex Phoebe Bridgers, and accompanied the Normal People star to the Baftas – but why did she drop out of school?
